q: SKY PRESENTERS APOLOGISE FOR SEXIST COMMENTS Sky football presenters Andy Coulson Gray and Richards Richard Keys have been suspended by Sky Sports after being caught by an open microphone making off-air comments about lineswoman Sian Massey at the Wolves-Liverpool game on Saturday. Somebody better get down there and explain offside to her, Richard Keys said. "Can you believe that?" Gray responded. "A female linesman. Women don't know the offside rule." The pair later apologised, but will not be on hand to present

"YouTube is the third biggest website in the world and massively social... Email is still the primary social communication media and Google Inc. is the fastest growing email provider in the world. "And they've got the largest blogging platform in the world so they are already a massive player in social, he added. In a conference call with financial analysts after the surprise announcement that Page would replace Eric Schmidt in April, co-founder Sergey Brin indicated the company would be putting more effort into the social arena.
